00001 /*
00002  * Conversion notes:
00003  * Using JLCA 3.0, the only problem was with the save and loads. I changed them both to be
00004  * StreamR/W around a FileStream. Originally, the save was a BinaryWriter over a FileStream
00005  * and the Reader was a StreamReader over another StreamReader.
00006  * In the Java code, it's a DataOutputStream around a FileOutputStream and a BufferedReader
00007  * around a FileReader.
00008  */

00014         //
00015         // Kernel Cache
00016         //
00017         // l is the number of total data items
00018         // size is the cache size limit in bytes
00019         //
00020         class Cache
00021         {
00022                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'l '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00023                 private int l;
00024                 private int size;
00025                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Field 'EnclosingInstance' was added to class 'head_t' to access its enclosing instance. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1019_3"'
00026                 private sealed class head_t
00027                 {
00028                         public head_t(Cache enclosingInstance)
00029                         {
00030                                 InitBlock(enclosingInstance);
00031                         }
00032                         private void  InitBlock(Cache enclosingInstance)
00033                         {
00034                                 this.enclosingInstance = enclosingInstance;
00035                         }
00036                         private Cache enclosingInstance;
00037                         public Cache Enclosing_Instance
00038                         {
00039                                 get
00040                                 {
00041                                         return enclosingInstance;
00042                                 }
00043                                 
00044                         }
00045                         internal head_t prev, next; // a cicular list
00046                         internal float[] data;
00047                         internal int len; // data[0,len) is cached in this entry
00048                 }
00049                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'head '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00050                 private head_t[] head;
00051                 private head_t lru_head;
00052                 
00053                 internal Cache(int l_, int size_)
00054                 {
00055                         l = l_;
00056                         size = size_;
00057                         head = new head_t[l];
00058             for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
00059             {
00060                 head[i] = new head_t(this);
00061             }
00062                         size /= 4;
00063                         size -= l * (16 / 4); // sizeof(head_t) == 16
00064                         lru_head = new head_t(this);
00065                         lru_head.next = lru_head.prev = lru_head;
00066                 }
00067                 
00068                 private void  lru_delete(head_t h)
00069                 {
00070                         // delete from current location
00071                         h.prev.next = h.next;
00072                         h.next.prev = h.prev;
00073                 }
00074                 
00075                 private void  lru_insert(head_t h)
00076                 {
00077                         // insert to last position
00078                         h.next = lru_head;
00079                         h.prev = lru_head.prev;
00080                         h.prev.next = h;
00081                         h.next.prev = h;
00082                 }
00083                 
00084                 // request data [0,len)
00085                 // return some position p where [p,len) need to be filled
00086                 // (p >= len if nothing needs to be filled)
00087                 // java: simulate pointer using single-element array
00088                 internal virtual int get_data(int index, float[][] data, int len)
00089                 {
00090                         head_t h = head[index];
00091                         if (h.len > 0)
00092                                 lru_delete(h);
00093                         int more = len - h.len;
00094                         
00095                         if (more > 0)
00096                         {
00097                                 // free old space
00098                                 while (size < more)
00099                                 {
00100                                         head_t old = lru_head.next;
00101                                         lru_delete(old);
00102                                         size += old.len;
00103                                         old.data = null;
00104                                         old.len = 0;
00105                                 }
00106                                 
00107                                 // allocate new space
00108                                 float[] new_data = new float[len];
00109                                 if (h.data != null)
00110                                         Array.Copy(h.data, 0, new_data, 0, h.len);
00111                                 h.data = new_data;
00112                                 size -= more;
00113                                 do 
00114                                 {
00115                                         int _ = h.len; h.len = len; len = _;
00116                                 }
00117                                 while (false);
00118                         }
00119                         
00120                         lru_insert(h);
00121                         data[0] = h.data;
00122                         return len;
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 internal virtual void  swap_index(int i, int j)
00126                 {
00127                         if (i == j)
00128                                 return ;
00129                         
00130                         if (head[i].len > 0)
00131                                 lru_delete(head[i]);
00132                         if (head[j].len > 0)
00133                                 lru_delete(head[j]);
00134                         do 
00135                         {
00136                                 float[] _ = head[i].data; head[i].data = head[j].data; head[j].data = _;
00137                         }
00138                         while (false);
00139                         do 
00140                         {
00141                                 int _ = head[i].len; head[i].len = head[j].len; head[j].len = _;
00142                         }
00143                         while (false);
00144                         if (head[i].len > 0)
00145                                 lru_insert(head[i]);
00146                         if (head[j].len > 0)
00147                                 lru_insert(head[j]);
00148                         
00149                         if (i > j)
00150                                 do 
00151                                 {
00152                                         int _ = i; i = j; j = _;
00153                                 }
00154                                 while (false);
00155                         for (head_t h = lru_head.next; h != lru_head; h = h.next)
00156                         {
00157                                 if (h.len > i)
00158                                 {
00159                                         if (h.len > j)
00160                                                 do 
00161                                                 {
00162                                                         float _ = h.data[i]; h.data[i] = h.data[j]; h.data[j] = _;
00163                                                 }
00164                                                 while (false);
00165                                         else
00166                                         {
00167                                                 // give up
00168                                                 lru_delete(h);
00169                                                 size += h.len;
00170                                                 h.data = null;
00171                                                 h.len = 0;
00172                                         }
00173                                 }
00174                         }
00175                 }
00176         }
00177         
00178         //
00179         // Kernel evaluation
00180         //
00181         // the static method k_function is for doing single kernel evaluation
00182         // the constructor of Kernel prepares to calculate the l*l kernel matrix
00183         // the member function get_Q is for getting one column from the Q Matrix
00184         //
00185         abstract class Kernel
00186         {
00187                 private svm_node[][] x;
00188                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'x_square '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00189                 private double[] x_square;
00190                 
00191                 // svm_parameter
00192                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'kernel_type '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00193                 private int kernel_type;
00194                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'degree '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00195                 private double degree;
00196                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'gamma '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00197                 private double gamma;
00198                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'coef0 '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00199                 private double coef0;
00200                 
00201                 internal abstract float[] get_Q(int column, int len);
00202                 
00203                 internal virtual void  swap_index(int i, int j)
00204                 {
00205                         do 
00206                         {
00207                                 svm_node[] _ = x[i]; x[i] = x[j]; x[j] = _;
00208                         }
00209                         while (false);
00210                         if (x_square != null)
00211                                 do 
00212                                 {
00213                                         double _ = x_square[i]; x_square[i] = x_square[j]; x_square[j] = _;
00214                                 }
00215                                 while (false);
00216                 }
00217                 
00218                 private static double tanh(double x)
00219                 {
00220                         double e = System.Math.Exp(x);
00221                         return 1.0 - 2.0 / (e * e + 1);
00222                 }
00223                 
00224                 internal virtual double kernel_function(int i, int j)
00225                 {
00226                         switch (kernel_type)
00227                         {
00228                                 
00229                                 case svm_parameter.LINEAR: 
00230                                         return dot(x[i], x[j]);
00231                                 
00232                                 case svm_parameter.POLY: 
00233                                         return System.Math.Pow(gamma * dot(x[i], x[j]) + coef0, degree);
00234                                 
00235                                 case svm_parameter.RBF: 
00236                                         return System.Math.Exp((- gamma) * (x_square[i] + x_square[j] - 2 * dot(x[i], x[j])));
00237                                 
00238                                 case svm_parameter.SIGMOID: 
00239                                         return tanh(gamma * dot(x[i], x[j]) + coef0);
00240                                 
00241                                 default: 
00242                                         return 0; // java
00243                                 
00244                         }
00245                 }
00246                 
00247                 internal Kernel(int l, svm_node[][] x_, svm_parameter param)
00248                 {
00249                         this.kernel_type = param.kernel_type;
00250                         this.degree = param.degree;
00251                         this.gamma = param.gamma;
00252                         this.coef0 = param.coef0;
00253                         
00254                         x = (svm_node[][]) x_.Clone();
00255                         
00256                         if (kernel_type == svm_parameter.RBF)
00257                         {
00258                                 x_square = new double[l];
00259                                 for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
00260                                         x_square[i] = dot(x[i], x[i]);
00261                         }
00262                         else
00263                                 x_square = null;
00264                 }
00265                 
00266                 internal static double dot(svm_node[] x, svm_node[] y)
00267                 {
00268                         double sum = 0;
00269                         int xlen = x.Length;
00270                         int ylen = y.Length;
00271                         int i = 0;
00272                         int j = 0;
00273                         while (i < xlen && j < ylen)
00274                         {
00275                                 if (x[i].index == y[j].index)
00276                                         sum += x[i++].value_Renamed * y[j++].value_Renamed;
00277                                 else
00278                                 {
00279                                         if (x[i].index > y[j].index)
00280                                                 ++j;
00281                                         else
00282                                                 ++i;
00283                                 }
00284                         }
00285                         return sum;
00286                 }
00287                 
00288                 internal static double k_function(svm_node[] x, svm_node[] y, svm_parameter param)
00289                 {
00290                         switch (param.kernel_type)
00291                         {
00292                                 
00293                                 case svm_parameter.LINEAR: 
00294                                         return dot(x, y);
00295                                 
00296                                 case svm_parameter.POLY: 
00297                                         return System.Math.Pow(param.gamma * dot(x, y) + param.coef0, param.degree);
00298                                 
00299                                 case svm_parameter.RBF: 
00300                                 {
00301                                         double sum = 0;
00302                                         int xlen = x.Length;
00303                                         int ylen = y.Length;
00304                                         int i = 0;
00305                                         int j = 0;
00306                                         while (i < xlen && j < ylen)
00307                                         {
00308                                                 if (x[i].index == y[j].index)
00309                                                 {
00310                                                         double d = x[i++].value_Renamed - y[j++].value_Renamed;
00311                                                         sum += d * d;
00312                                                 }
00313                                                 else if (x[i].index > y[j].index)
00314                                                 {
00315                                                         sum += y[j].value_Renamed * y[j].value_Renamed;
00316                                                         ++j;
00317                                                 }
00318                                                 else
00319                                                 {
00320                                                         sum += x[i].value_Renamed * x[i].value_Renamed;
00321                                                         ++i;
00322                                                 }
00323                                         }
00324                                         
00325                                         while (i < xlen)
00326                                         {
00327                                                 sum += x[i].value_Renamed * x[i].value_Renamed;
00328                                                 ++i;
00329                                         }
00330                                         
00331                                         while (j < ylen)
00332                                         {
00333                                                 sum += y[j].value_Renamed * y[j].value_Renamed;
00334                                                 ++j;
00335                                         }
00336                                         
00337                                         return System.Math.Exp((- param.gamma) * sum);
00338                                 }
00339                                 
00340                                 case svm_parameter.SIGMOID: 
00341                                         return tanh(param.gamma * dot(x, y) + param.coef0);
00342                                 
00343                                 default: 
00344                                         return 0; // java
00345                                 
00346                         }
00347                 }
00348         }
00349         
00350         // Generalized SMO+SVMlight algorithm
00351         // Solves:
00352         //
00353         //      min 0.5(\alpha^T Q \alpha) + b^T \alpha
00354         //
00355         //              y^T \alpha = \delta
00356         //              y_i = +1 or -1
00357         //              0 <= alpha_i <= Cp for y_i = 1
00358         //              0 <= alpha_i <= Cn for y_i = -1
00359         //
00360         // Given:
00361         //
00362         //      Q, b, y, Cp, Cn, and an initial feasible point \alpha
00363         //      l is the size of vectors and matrices
00364         //      eps is the stopping criterion
00365         //
00366         // solution will be put in \alpha, objective value will be put in obj
00367         //
00368         class Solver
00369         {
00370                 internal int active_size;
00371                 internal sbyte[] y;
00372                 internal double[] G; // gradient of objective function
00373                 internal const sbyte LOWER_BOUND = 0;
00374                 internal const sbyte UPPER_BOUND = 1;
00375                 internal const sbyte FREE = 2;
00376                 internal sbyte[] alpha_status; // LOWER_BOUND, UPPER_BOUND, FREE
00377                 internal double[] alpha;
00378                 internal Kernel Q;
00379                 internal double eps;
00380                 internal double Cp, Cn;
00381                 internal double[] b;
00382                 internal int[] active_set;
00383                 internal double[] G_bar; // gradient, if we treat free variables as 0
00384                 internal int l;
00385                 internal bool unshrinked; // XXX
00386                 
00387                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'INF '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
00388                 internal static readonly double INF = System.Double.PositiveInfinity;
00389                 
00390                 internal virtual double get_C(int i)
00391                 {
00392                         return (y[i] > 0)?Cp:Cn;
00393                 }
00394                 internal virtual void  update_alpha_status(int i)
00395                 {
00396                         if (alpha[i] >= get_C(i))
00397                                 alpha_status[i] = UPPER_BOUND;
00398                         else if (alpha[i] <= 0)
00399                                 alpha_status[i] = LOWER_BOUND;
00400                         else
00401                                 alpha_status[i] = FREE;
00402                 }
00403                 internal virtual bool is_upper_bound(int i)
00404                 {
00405                         return alpha_status[i] == UPPER_BOUND;
00406                 }
00407                 internal virtual bool is_lower_bound(int i)
00408                 {
00409                         return alpha_status[i] == LOWER_BOUND;
00410                 }
00411                 internal virtual bool is_free(int i)
00412                 {
00413                         return alpha_status[i] == FREE;
00414                 }
00415                 
00416                 // java: information about solution except alpha,
00417                 // because we cannot return multiple values otherwise...
00418                 internal class SolutionInfo
00419                 {
00420                         internal double obj;
00421                         internal double rho;
00422                         internal double upper_bound_p;
00423                         internal double upper_bound_n;
00424                         internal double r; // for Solver_NU
00425                 }
00426                 
00427                 internal virtual void  swap_index(int i, int j)
00428                 {
00429                         Q.swap_index(i, j);
00430                         do 
00431                         {
00432                                 sbyte _ = y[i]; y[i] = y[j]; y[j] = _;
00433                         }
00434                         while (false);
00435                         do 
00436                         {
00437                                 double _ = G[i]; G[i] = G[j]; G[j] = _;
00438                         }
00439                         while (false);
00440                         do 
00441                         {
00442                                 sbyte _ = alpha_status[i]; alpha_status[i] = alpha_status[j]; alpha_status[j] = _;
00443                         }
00444                         while (false);
00445                         do 
00446                         {
00447                                 double _ = alpha[i]; alpha[i] = alpha[j]; alpha[j] = _;
00448                         }
00449                         while (false);
00450                         do 
00451                         {
00452                                 double _ = b[i]; b[i] = b[j]; b[j] = _;
00453                         }
00454                         while (false);
00455                         do 
00456                         {
00457                                 int _ = active_set[i]; active_set[i] = active_set[j]; active_set[j] = _;
00458                         }
00459                         while (false);
00460                         do 
00461                         {
00462                                 double _ = G_bar[i]; G_bar[i] = G_bar[j]; G_bar[j] = _;
00463                         }
00464                         while (false);
00465                 }
00466                 
00467                 internal virtual void  reconstruct_gradient()
00468                 {
00469                         // reconstruct inactive elements of G from G_bar and free variables
00470                         
00471                         if (active_size == l)
00472                                 return ;
00473                         
00474                         int i;
00475                         for (i = active_size; i < l; i++)
00476                                 G[i] = G_bar[i] + b[i];
00477                         
00478                         for (i = 0; i < active_size; i++)
00479                                 if (is_free(i))
00480                                 {
00481                                         float[] Q_i = Q.get_Q(i, l);
00482                                         double alpha_i = alpha[i];
00483                                         for (int j = active_size; j < l; j++)
00484                                                 G[j] += alpha_i * Q_i[j];
00485                                 }
00486                 }
00487                 
00488                 internal virtual void  Solve(int l, Kernel Q, double[] b_, sbyte[] y_, double[] alpha_, double Cp, double Cn, double eps, SolutionInfo si, int shrinking)
00489                 {
00490                         this.l = l;
00491                         this.Q = Q;
00492                         b = new double[b_.Length];
00493                         b_.CopyTo(b, 0);
00494                         y = new sbyte[y_.Length];
00495                         y_.CopyTo(y, 0);
00496                         alpha = new double[alpha_.Length];
00497                         alpha_.CopyTo(alpha, 0);
00498                         this.Cp = Cp;
00499                         this.Cn = Cn;
00500                         this.eps = eps;
00501                         this.unshrinked = false;
00502                         
00503                         // initialize alpha_status
00504                         {
00505                                 alpha_status = new sbyte[l];
00506                                 for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
00507                                         update_alpha_status(i);
00508                         }
00509                         
00510                         // initialize active set (for shrinking)
00511                         {
00512                                 active_set = new int[l];
00513                                 for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
00514                                         active_set[i] = i;
00515                                 active_size = l;
00516                         }
00517                         
00518                         // initialize gradient
00519                         {
00520                                 G = new double[l];
00521                                 G_bar = new double[l];
00522                                 int i;
00523                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00524                                 {
00525                                         G[i] = b[i];
00526                                         G_bar[i] = 0;
00527                                 }
00528                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00529                                         if (!is_lower_bound(i))
00530                                         {
00531                                                 float[] Q_i = Q.get_Q(i, l);
00532                                                 double alpha_i = alpha[i];
00533                                                 int j;
00534                                                 for (j = 0; j < l; j++)
00535                                                         G[j] += alpha_i * Q_i[j];
00536                                                 if (is_upper_bound(i))
00537                                                         for (j = 0; j < l; j++)
00538                                                                 G_bar[j] += get_C(i) * Q_i[j];
00539                                         }
00540                         }
00541                         
00542                         // optimization step
00543                         
00544                         int iter = 0;
00545                         int counter = System.Math.Min(l, 1000) + 1;
00546                         int[] working_set = new int[2];
00547                         
00548                         while (true)
00549                         {
00550                                 // show progress and do shrinking
00551                                 
00552                                 if (--counter == 0)
00553                                 {
00554                                         counter = System.Math.Min(l, 1000);
00555                                         if (shrinking != 0)
00556                                                 do_shrinking();
00557                                         System.Console.Error.Write(".");
00558                                 }
00559                                 
00560                                 if (select_working_set(working_set) != 0)
00561                                 {
00562                                         // reconstruct the whole gradient
00563                                         reconstruct_gradient();
00564                                         // reset active set size and check
00565                                         active_size = l;
00566                                         System.Console.Error.Write("*");
00567                                         if (select_working_set(working_set) != 0)
00568                                                 break;
00569                                         else
00570                                                 counter = 1; // do shrinking next iteration
00571                                 }
00572                                 
00573                                 int i = working_set[0];
00574                                 int j = working_set[1];
00575                                 
00576                                 ++iter;
00577                                 
00578                                 // update alpha[i] and alpha[j], handle bounds carefully
00579                                 
00580                                 float[] Q_i = Q.get_Q(i, active_size);
00581                                 float[] Q_j = Q.get_Q(j, active_size);
00582                                 
00583                                 double C_i = get_C(i);
00584                                 double C_j = get_C(j);
00585                                 
00586                                 double old_alpha_i = alpha[i];
00587                                 double old_alpha_j = alpha[j];
00588                                 
00589                                 if (y[i] != y[j])
00590                                 {
00591                                         double delta = (- G[i] - G[j]) / System.Math.Max(Q_i[i] + Q_j[j] + 2 * Q_i[j], (float) 0);
00592                                         double diff = alpha[i] - alpha[j];
00593                                         alpha[i] += delta;
00594                                         alpha[j] += delta;
00595                                         
00596                                         if (diff > 0)
00597                                         {
00598                                                 if (alpha[j] < 0)
00599                                                 {
00600                                                         alpha[j] = 0;
00601                                                         alpha[i] = diff;
00602                                                 }
00603                                         }
00604                                         else
00605                                         {
00606                                                 if (alpha[i] < 0)
00607                                                 {
00608                                                         alpha[i] = 0;
00609                                                         alpha[j] = - diff;
00610                                                 }
00611                                         }
00612                                         if (diff > C_i - C_j)
00613                                         {
00614                                                 if (alpha[i] > C_i)
00615                                                 {
00616                                                         alpha[i] = C_i;
00617                                                         alpha[j] = C_i - diff;
00618                                                 }
00619                                         }
00620                                         else
00621                                         {
00622                                                 if (alpha[j] > C_j)
00623                                                 {
00624                                                         alpha[j] = C_j;
00625                                                         alpha[i] = C_j + diff;
00626                                                 }
00627                                         }
00628                                 }
00629                                 else
00630                                 {
00631                                         double delta = (G[i] - G[j]) / System.Math.Max(Q_i[i] + Q_j[j] - 2 * Q_i[j], (float) 0);
00632                                         double sum = alpha[i] + alpha[j];
00633                                         alpha[i] -= delta;
00634                                         alpha[j] += delta;
00635                                         if (sum > C_i)
00636                                         {
00637                                                 if (alpha[i] > C_i)
00638                                                 {
00639                                                         alpha[i] = C_i;
00640                                                         alpha[j] = sum - C_i;
00641                                                 }
00642                                         }
00643                                         else
00644                                         {
00645                                                 if (alpha[j] < 0)
00646                                                 {
00647                                                         alpha[j] = 0;
00648                                                         alpha[i] = sum;
00649                                                 }
00650                                         }
00651                                         if (sum > C_j)
00652                                         {
00653                                                 if (alpha[j] > C_j)
00654                                                 {
00655                                                         alpha[j] = C_j;
00656                                                         alpha[i] = sum - C_j;
00657                                                 }
00658                                         }
00659                                         else
00660                                         {
00661                                                 if (alpha[i] < 0)
00662                                                 {
00663                                                         alpha[i] = 0;
00664                                                         alpha[j] = sum;
00665                                                 }
00666                                         }
00667                                 }
00668                                 
00669                                 // update G
00670                                 
00671                                 double delta_alpha_i = alpha[i] - old_alpha_i;
00672                                 double delta_alpha_j = alpha[j] - old_alpha_j;
00673                                 
00674                                 for (int k = 0; k < active_size; k++)
00675                                 {
00676                                         G[k] += Q_i[k] * delta_alpha_i + Q_j[k] * delta_alpha_j;
00677                                 }
00678                                 
00679                                 // update alpha_status and G_bar
00680                                 
00681                                 {
00682                                         bool ui = is_upper_bound(i);
00683                                         bool uj = is_upper_bound(j);
00684                                         update_alpha_status(i);
00685                                         update_alpha_status(j);
00686                                         int k;
00687                                         if (ui != is_upper_bound(i))
00688                                         {
00689                                                 Q_i = Q.get_Q(i, l);
00690                                                 if (ui)
00691                                                         for (k = 0; k < l; k++)
00692                                                                 G_bar[k] -= C_i * Q_i[k];
00693                                                 else
00694                                                         for (k = 0; k < l; k++)
00695                                                                 G_bar[k] += C_i * Q_i[k];
00696                                         }
00697                                         
00698                                         if (uj != is_upper_bound(j))
00699                                         {
00700                                                 Q_j = Q.get_Q(j, l);
00701                                                 if (uj)
00702                                                         for (k = 0; k < l; k++)
00703                                                                 G_bar[k] -= C_j * Q_j[k];
00704                                                 else
00705                                                         for (k = 0; k < l; k++)
00706                                                                 G_bar[k] += C_j * Q_j[k];
00707                                         }
00708                                 }
00709                         }
00710                         
00711                         // calculate rho
00712                         
00713                         si.rho = calculate_rho();
00714                         
00715                         // calculate objective value
00716                         {
00717                                 double v = 0;
00718                                 int i;
00719                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
00720                                         v += alpha[i] * (G[i] + b[i]);
00721                                 
00722                                 si.obj = v / 2;
00723                         }
00724                         
00725                         // put back the solution
00726                         {
00727                                 for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
00728                                         alpha_[active_set[i]] = alpha[i];
00729                         }
00730                         
00731                         si.upper_bound_p = Cp;
00732                         si.upper_bound_n = Cn;
00733                         
00734                         System.Console.Out.Write("\noptimization finished, #iter = " + iter + "\n");
00735                 }
00736                 
00737                 // return 1 if already optimal, return 0 otherwise
00738                 internal virtual int select_working_set(int[] working_set)
00739                 {
00740                         // return i,j which maximize -grad(f)^T d , under constraint
00741                         // if alpha_i == C, d != +1
00742                         // if alpha_i == 0, d != -1
00743                         
00744                         double Gmax1 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i*d = +1 }
00745                         int Gmax1_idx = - 1;
00746                         
00747                         double Gmax2 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i*d = -1 }
00748                         int Gmax2_idx = - 1;
00749                         
00750                         for (int i = 0; i < active_size; i++)
00751                         {
00752                                 if (y[i] == + 1)
00753                                 // y = +1
00754                                 {
00755                                         if (!is_upper_bound(i))
00756                                         // d = +1
00757                                         {
00758                                                 if (- G[i] > Gmax1)
00759                                                 {
00760                                                         Gmax1 = - G[i];
00761                                                         Gmax1_idx = i;
00762                                                 }
00763                                         }
00764                                         if (!is_lower_bound(i))
00765                                         // d = -1
00766                                         {
00767                                                 if (G[i] > Gmax2)
00768                                                 {
00769                                                         Gmax2 = G[i];
00770                                                         Gmax2_idx = i;
00771                                                 }
00772                                         }
00773                                 }
00774                                 // y = -1
00775                                 else
00776                                 {
00777                                         if (!is_upper_bound(i))
00778                                         // d = +1
00779                                         {
00780                                                 if (- G[i] > Gmax2)
00781                                                 {
00782                                                         Gmax2 = - G[i];
00783                                                         Gmax2_idx = i;
00784                                                 }
00785                                         }
00786                                         if (!is_lower_bound(i))
00787                                         // d = -1
00788                                         {
00789                                                 if (G[i] > Gmax1)
00790                                                 {
00791                                                         Gmax1 = G[i];
00792                                                         Gmax1_idx = i;
00793                                                 }
00794                                         }
00795                                 }
00796                         }
00797                         
00798                         if (Gmax1 + Gmax2 < eps)
00799                                 return 1;
00800                         
00801                         working_set[0] = Gmax1_idx;
00802                         working_set[1] = Gmax2_idx;
00803                         return 0;
00804                 }
00805                 
00806                 internal virtual void  do_shrinking()
00807                 {
00808                         int i, j, k;
00809                         int[] working_set = new int[2];
00810                         if (select_working_set(working_set) != 0)
00811                                 return ;
00812                         i = working_set[0];
00813                         j = working_set[1];
00814                         double Gm1 = (- y[j]) * G[j];
00815                         double Gm2 = y[i] * G[i];
00816                         
00817                         // shrink
00818                         
00819                         for (k = 0; k < active_size; k++)
00820                         {
00821                                 if (is_lower_bound(k))
00822                                 {
00823                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
00824                                         {
00825                                                 if (- G[k] >= Gm1)
00826                                                         continue;
00827                                         }
00828                                         else if (- G[k] >= Gm2)
00829                                                 continue;
00830                                 }
00831                                 else if (is_upper_bound(k))
00832                                 {
00833                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
00834                                         {
00835                                                 if (G[k] >= Gm2)
00836                                                         continue;
00837                                         }
00838                                         else if (G[k] >= Gm1)
00839                                                 continue;
00840                                 }
00841                                 else
00842                                         continue;
00843                                 
00844                                 --active_size;
00845                                 swap_index(k, active_size);
00846                                 --k; // look at the newcomer
00847                         }
00848                         
00849                         // unshrink, check all variables again before final iterations
00850                         
00851                         if (unshrinked || - (Gm1 + Gm2) > eps * 10)
00852                                 return ;
00853                         
00854                         unshrinked = true;
00855                         reconstruct_gradient();
00856                         
00857                         for (k = l - 1; k >= active_size; k--)
00858                         {
00859                                 if (is_lower_bound(k))
00860                                 {
00861                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
00862                                         {
00863                                                 if (- G[k] < Gm1)
00864                                                         continue;
00865                                         }
00866                                         else if (- G[k] < Gm2)
00867                                                 continue;
00868                                 }
00869                                 else if (is_upper_bound(k))
00870                                 {
00871                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
00872                                         {
00873                                                 if (G[k] < Gm2)
00874                                                         continue;
00875                                         }
00876                                         else if (G[k] < Gm1)
00877                                                 continue;
00878                                 }
00879                                 else
00880                                         continue;
00881                                 
00882                                 swap_index(k, active_size);
00883                                 active_size++;
00884                                 ++k; // look at the newcomer
00885                         }
00886                 }
00887                 
00888                 internal virtual double calculate_rho()
00889                 {
00890                         double r;
00891                         int nr_free = 0;
00892                         double ub = INF, lb = - INF, sum_free = 0;
00893                         for (int i = 0; i < active_size; i++)
00894                         {
00895                                 double yG = y[i] * G[i];
00896                                 
00897                                 if (is_lower_bound(i))
00898                                 {
00899                                         if (y[i] > 0)
00900                                                 ub = System.Math.Min(ub, yG);
00901                                         else
00902                                                 lb = System.Math.Max(lb, yG);
00903                                 }
00904                                 else if (is_upper_bound(i))
00905                                 {
00906                                         if (y[i] < 0)
00907                                                 ub = System.Math.Min(ub, yG);
00908                                         else
00909                                                 lb = System.Math.Max(lb, yG);
00910                                 }
00911                                 else
00912                                 {
00913                                         ++nr_free;
00914                                         sum_free += yG;
00915                                 }
00916                         }
00917                         
00918                         if (nr_free > 0)
00919                                 r = sum_free / nr_free;
00920                         else
00921                                 r = (ub + lb) / 2;
00922                         
00923                         return r;
00924                 }
00925         }
00926         
00927         //
00928         // Solver for nu-svm classification and regression
00929         //
00930         // additional constraint: e^T \alpha = constant
00931         //
00932         sealed class Solver_NU:Solver
00933         {
00934                 private SolutionInfo si;
00935                 
00936                 internal override void  Solve(int l, Kernel Q, double[] b, sbyte[] y, double[] alpha, double Cp, double Cn, double eps, SolutionInfo si, int shrinking)
00937                 {
00938                         this.si = si;
00939                         base.Solve(l, Q, b, y, alpha, Cp, Cn, eps, si, shrinking);
00940                 }
00941                 
00942                 internal override int select_working_set(int[] working_set)
00943                 {
00944                         // return i,j which maximize -grad(f)^T d , under constraint
00945                         // if alpha_i == C, d != +1
00946                         // if alpha_i == 0, d != -1
00947                         
00948                         double Gmax1 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = +1, d = +1 }
00949                         int Gmax1_idx = - 1;
00950                         
00951                         double Gmax2 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = +1, d = -1 }
00952                         int Gmax2_idx = - 1;
00953                         
00954                         double Gmax3 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = -1, d = +1 }
00955                         int Gmax3_idx = - 1;
00956                         
00957                         double Gmax4 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = -1, d = -1 }
00958                         int Gmax4_idx = - 1;
00959                         
00960                         for (int i = 0; i < active_size; i++)
00961                         {
00962                                 if (y[i] == + 1)
00963                                 // y == +1
00964                                 {
00965                                         if (!is_upper_bound(i))
00966                                         // d = +1
00967                                         {
00968                                                 if (- G[i] > Gmax1)
00969                                                 {
00970                                                         Gmax1 = - G[i];
00971                                                         Gmax1_idx = i;
00972                                                 }
00973                                         }
00974                                         if (!is_lower_bound(i))
00975                                         // d = -1
00976                                         {
00977                                                 if (G[i] > Gmax2)
00978                                                 {
00979                                                         Gmax2 = G[i];
00980                                                         Gmax2_idx = i;
00981                                                 }
00982                                         }
00983                                 }
00984                                 // y == -1
00985                                 else
00986                                 {
00987                                         if (!is_upper_bound(i))
00988                                         // d = +1
00989                                         {
00990                                                 if (- G[i] > Gmax3)
00991                                                 {
00992                                                         Gmax3 = - G[i];
00993                                                         Gmax3_idx = i;
00994                                                 }
00995                                         }
00996                                         if (!is_lower_bound(i))
00997                                         // d = -1
00998                                         {
00999                                                 if (G[i] > Gmax4)
01000                                                 {
01001                                                         Gmax4 = G[i];
01002                                                         Gmax4_idx = i;
01003                                                 }
01004                                         }
01005                                 }
01006                         }
01007                         
01008                         if (System.Math.Max(Gmax1 + Gmax2, Gmax3 + Gmax4) < eps)
01009                                 return 1;
01010                         
01011                         if (Gmax1 + Gmax2 > Gmax3 + Gmax4)
01012                         {
01013                                 working_set[0] = Gmax1_idx;
01014                                 working_set[1] = Gmax2_idx;
01015                         }
01016                         else
01017                         {
01018                                 working_set[0] = Gmax3_idx;
01019                                 working_set[1] = Gmax4_idx;
01020                         }
01021                         return 0;
01022                 }
01023                 
01024                 internal override void  do_shrinking()
01025                 {
01026                         double Gmax1 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = +1, d = +1 }
01027                         double Gmax2 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = +1, d = -1 }
01028                         double Gmax3 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = -1, d = +1 }
01029                         double Gmax4 = - INF; // max { -grad(f)_i * d | y_i = -1, d = -1 }
01030                         
01031                         int k;
01032                         for (k = 0; k < active_size; k++)
01033                         {
01034                                 if (!is_upper_bound(k))
01035                                 {
01036                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01037                                         {
01038                                                 if (- G[k] > Gmax1)
01039                                                         Gmax1 = - G[k];
01040                                         }
01041                                         else if (- G[k] > Gmax3)
01042                                                 Gmax3 = - G[k];
01043                                 }
01044                                 if (!is_lower_bound(k))
01045                                 {
01046                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01047                                         {
01048                                                 if (G[k] > Gmax2)
01049                                                         Gmax2 = G[k];
01050                                         }
01051                                         else if (G[k] > Gmax4)
01052                                                 Gmax4 = G[k];
01053                                 }
01054                         }
01055                         
01056                         double Gm1 = - Gmax2;
01057                         double Gm2 = - Gmax1;
01058                         double Gm3 = - Gmax4;
01059                         double Gm4 = - Gmax3;
01060                         
01061                         for (k = 0; k < active_size; k++)
01062                         {
01063                                 if (is_lower_bound(k))
01064                                 {
01065                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01066                                         {
01067                                                 if (- G[k] >= Gm1)
01068                                                         continue;
01069                                         }
01070                                         else if (- G[k] >= Gm3)
01071                                                 continue;
01072                                 }
01073                                 else if (is_upper_bound(k))
01074                                 {
01075                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01076                                         {
01077                                                 if (G[k] >= Gm2)
01078                                                         continue;
01079                                         }
01080                                         else if (G[k] >= Gm4)
01081                                                 continue;
01082                                 }
01083                                 else
01084                                         continue;
01085                                 
01086                                 --active_size;
01087                                 swap_index(k, active_size);
01088                                 --k; // look at the newcomer
01089                         }
01090                         
01091                         // unshrink, check all variables again before final iterations
01092                         
01093                         if (unshrinked || System.Math.Max(- (Gm1 + Gm2), - (Gm3 + Gm4)) > eps * 10)
01094                                 return ;
01095                         
01096                         unshrinked = true;
01097                         reconstruct_gradient();
01098                         
01099                         for (k = l - 1; k >= active_size; k--)
01100                         {
01101                                 if (is_lower_bound(k))
01102                                 {
01103                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01104                                         {
01105                                                 if (- G[k] < Gm1)
01106                                                         continue;
01107                                         }
01108                                         else if (- G[k] < Gm3)
01109                                                 continue;
01110                                 }
01111                                 else if (is_upper_bound(k))
01112                                 {
01113                                         if (y[k] == + 1)
01114                                         {
01115                                                 if (G[k] < Gm2)
01116                                                         continue;
01117                                         }
01118                                         else if (G[k] < Gm4)
01119                                                 continue;
01120                                 }
01121                                 else
01122                                         continue;
01123                                 
01124                                 swap_index(k, active_size);
01125                                 active_size++;
01126                                 ++k; // look at the newcomer
01127                         }
01128                 }
01129                 
01130                 internal override double calculate_rho()
01131                 {
01132                         int nr_free1 = 0, nr_free2 = 0;
01133                         double ub1 = INF, ub2 = INF;
01134                         double lb1 = - INF, lb2 = - INF;
01135                         double sum_free1 = 0, sum_free2 = 0;
01136                         
01137                         for (int i = 0; i < active_size; i++)
01138                         {
01139                                 if (y[i] == + 1)
01140                                 {
01141                                         if (is_lower_bound(i))
01142                                                 ub1 = System.Math.Min(ub1, G[i]);
01143                                         else if (is_upper_bound(i))
01144                                                 lb1 = System.Math.Max(lb1, G[i]);
01145                                         else
01146                                         {
01147                                                 ++nr_free1;
01148                                                 sum_free1 += G[i];
01149                                         }
01150                                 }
01151                                 else
01152                                 {
01153                                         if (is_lower_bound(i))
01154                                                 ub2 = System.Math.Min(ub2, G[i]);
01155                                         else if (is_upper_bound(i))
01156                                                 lb2 = System.Math.Max(lb2, G[i]);
01157                                         else
01158                                         {
01159                                                 ++nr_free2;
01160                                                 sum_free2 += G[i];
01161                                         }
01162                                 }
01163                         }
01164                         
01165                         double r1, r2;
01166                         if (nr_free1 > 0)
01167                                 r1 = sum_free1 / nr_free1;
01168                         else
01169                                 r1 = (ub1 + lb1) / 2;
01170                         
01171                         if (nr_free2 > 0)
01172                                 r2 = sum_free2 / nr_free2;
01173                         else
01174                                 r2 = (ub2 + lb2) / 2;
01175                         
01176                         si.r = (r1 + r2) / 2;
01177                         return (r1 - r2) / 2;
01178                 }
01179         }
01180         
01181         //
01182         // Q matrices for various formulations
01183         //
01184         class SVC_Q:Kernel
01185         {
01186                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'y '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01187                 private sbyte[] y;
01188                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'cache '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01189                 private Cache cache;
01190                 
01191                 internal SVC_Q(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, sbyte[] y_):base(prob.l, prob.x, param)
01192                 {
01193                         y = new sbyte[y_.Length];
01194                         y_.CopyTo(y, 0);
01195                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01196                         cache = new Cache(prob.l, (int) (param.cache_size * (1 << 20)));
01197                 }
01198                 
01199                 internal override float[] get_Q(int i, int len)
01200                 {
01201                         float[][] data = new float[1][];
01202                         int start;
01203                         if ((start = cache.get_data(i, data, len)) < len)
01204                         {
01205                                 for (int j = start; j < len; j++)
01206                                 {
01207                                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01208                                         data[0][j] = (float) (y[i] * y[j] * kernel_function(i, j));
01209                                 }
01210                         }
01211                         return data[0];
01212                 }
01213                 
01214                 internal override void  swap_index(int i, int j)
01215                 {
01216                         cache.swap_index(i, j);
01217                         base.swap_index(i, j);
01218                         do 
01219                         {
01220                                 sbyte _ = y[i]; y[i] = y[j]; y[j] = _;
01221                         }
01222                         while (false);
01223                 }
01224         }

01231                 internal ONE_CLASS_Q(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param):base(prob.l, prob.x, param)
01232                 {

01234                         cache = new Cache(prob.l, (int) (param.cache_size * (1 << 20)));
01235                 }
01236                 
01237                 internal override float[] get_Q(int i, int len)
01238                 {
01239                         float[][] data = new float[1][];
01240                         int start;
01241                         if ((start = cache.get_data(i, data, len)) < len)
01242                         {
01243                                 for (int j = start; j < len; j++)
01244                                 {
01245                                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01246                                         data[0][j] = (float) kernel_function(i, j);
01247                                 }
01248                         }

01250                 }
