01258         
01259         class SVR_Q:Kernel
01260         {
01261                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'l '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01262                 private int l;
01263                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'cache '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01264                 private Cache cache;
01265                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'sign '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01266                 private sbyte[] sign;
01267                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'index '. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
01268                 private int[] index;
01269                 private int next_buffer;
01270                 private float[][] buffer;
01271                 
01272                 internal SVR_Q(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param):base(prob.l, prob.x, param)
01273                 {
01274                         l = prob.l;
01275                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01276                         cache = new Cache(l, (int) (param.cache_size * (1 << 20)));
01277                         sign = new sbyte[2 * l];
01278                         index = new int[2 * l];
01279                         for (int k = 0; k < l; k++)
01280                         {
01281                                 sign[k] = 1;
01282                                 sign[k + l] = - 1;
01283                                 index[k] = k;
01284                                 index[k + l] = k;
01285                         }
01286                         buffer = new float[2][];
01287                         for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
01288                         {
01289                                 buffer[i] = new float[2 * l];
01290                         }
01291                         next_buffer = 0;
01292                 }
01293                 
01294                 internal override void  swap_index(int i, int j)
01295                 {
01296                         do 
01297                         {
01298                                 sbyte _ = sign[i]; sign[i] = sign[j]; sign[j] = _;
01299                         }
01300                         while (false);
01301                         do 
01302                         {
01303                                 int _ = index[i]; index[i] = index[j]; index[j] = _;
01304                         }
01305                         while (false);
01306                 }
01307                 
01308                 internal override float[] get_Q(int i, int len)
01309                 {
01310                         float[][] data = new float[1][];
01311                         int real_i = index[i];
01312                         if (cache.get_data(real_i, data, l) < l)
01313                         {
01314                                 for (int j = 0; j < l; j++)
01315                                 {
01316                                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01317                                         data[0][j] = (float) kernel_function(real_i, j);
01318                                 }
01319                         }
01320                         
01321                         // reorder and copy
01322                         float[] buf = buffer[next_buffer];
01323                         next_buffer = 1 - next_buffer;
01324                         sbyte si = sign[i];
01325                         for (int j = 0; j < len; j++)
01326                                 buf[j] = si * sign[j] * data[0][index[j]];
01327                         return buf;
01328                 }
01329         }
01330         
01331         public class svm
01332         {
01333                 //
01334                 // construct and solve various formulations
01335                 //
01336                 private static void  solve_c_svc(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double[] alpha, Solver.SolutionInfo si, double Cp, double Cn)
01337                 {
01338                         int l = prob.l;
01339                         double[] minus_ones = new double[l];
01340                         sbyte[] y = new sbyte[l];
01341                         
01342                         int i;
01343                         
01344                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01345                         {
01346                                 alpha[i] = 0;
01347                                 minus_ones[i] = - 1;
01348                                 if (prob.y[i] > 0)
01349                                         y[i] = (sbyte) (+ 1);
01350                                 else
01351                                         y[i] = - 1;
01352                         }
01353                         
01354                         Solver s = new Solver();
01355                         s.Solve(l, new SVC_Q(prob, param, y), minus_ones, y, alpha, Cp, Cn, param.eps, si, param.shrinking);
01356                         
01357                         double sum_alpha = 0;
01358                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01359                                 sum_alpha += alpha[i];
01360                         
01361                         if (Cp == Cn)
01362                                 System.Console.Out.Write("nu = " + sum_alpha / (Cp * prob.l) + "\n");
01363                         
01364                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01365                                 alpha[i] *= y[i];
01366                 }
01367                 
01368                 private static void  solve_nu_svc(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double[] alpha, Solver.SolutionInfo si)
01369                 {
01370                         int i;
01371                         int l = prob.l;
01372                         double nu = param.nu;
01373                         
01374                         sbyte[] y = new sbyte[l];
01375                         
01376                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01377                                 if (prob.y[i] > 0)
01378                                         y[i] = (sbyte) (+ 1);
01379                                 else
01380                                         y[i] = - 1;
01381                         
01382                         double sum_pos = nu * l / 2;
01383                         double sum_neg = nu * l / 2;
01384                         
01385                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01386                                 if (y[i] == + 1)
01387                                 {
01388                                         alpha[i] = System.Math.Min(1.0, sum_pos);
01389                                         sum_pos -= alpha[i];
01390                                 }
01391                                 else
01392                                 {
01393                                         alpha[i] = System.Math.Min(1.0, sum_neg);
01394                                         sum_neg -= alpha[i];
01395                                 }
01396                         
01397                         double[] zeros = new double[l];
01398                         
01399                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01400                                 zeros[i] = 0;
01401                         
01402                         Solver_NU s = new Solver_NU();
01403                         s.Solve(l, new SVC_Q(prob, param, y), zeros, y, alpha, 1.0, 1.0, param.eps, si, param.shrinking);
01404                         double r = si.r;
01405                         
01406                         System.Console.Out.Write("C = " + 1 / r + "\n");
01407                         
01408                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01409                                 alpha[i] *= y[i] / r;
01410                         
01411                         si.rho /= r;
01412                         si.obj /= (r * r);
01413                         si.upper_bound_p = 1 / r;
01414                         si.upper_bound_n = 1 / r;
01415                 }
01416                 
01417                 private static void  solve_one_class(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double[] alpha, Solver.SolutionInfo si)
01418                 {
01419                         int l = prob.l;
01420                         double[] zeros = new double[l];
01421                         sbyte[] ones = new sbyte[l];
01422                         int i;
01423                         
01424                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01425                         int n = (int) (param.nu * prob.l); // # of alpha's at upper bound
01426                         
01427                         for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
01428                                 alpha[i] = 1;
01429                         alpha[n] = param.nu * prob.l - n;
01430                         for (i = n + 1; i < l; i++)
01431                                 alpha[i] = 0;
01432                         
01433                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01434                         {
01435                                 zeros[i] = 0;
01436                                 ones[i] = 1;
01437                         }
01438                         
01439                         Solver s = new Solver();
01440                         s.Solve(l, new ONE_CLASS_Q(prob, param), zeros, ones, alpha, 1.0, 1.0, param.eps, si, param.shrinking);
01441                 }
01442                 
01443                 private static void  solve_epsilon_svr(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double[] alpha, Solver.SolutionInfo si)
01444                 {
01445                         int l = prob.l;
01446                         double[] alpha2 = new double[2 * l];
01447                         double[] linear_term = new double[2 * l];
01448                         sbyte[] y = new sbyte[2 * l];
01449                         int i;
01450                         
01451                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01452                         {
01453                                 alpha2[i] = 0;
01454                                 linear_term[i] = param.p - prob.y[i];
01455                                 y[i] = 1;
01456                                 
01457                                 alpha2[i + l] = 0;
01458                                 linear_term[i + l] = param.p + prob.y[i];
01459                                 y[i + l] = - 1;
01460                         }
01461                         
01462                         Solver s = new Solver();
01463                         s.Solve(2 * l, new SVR_Q(prob, param), linear_term, y, alpha2, param.C, param.C, param.eps, si, param.shrinking);
01464                         
01465                         double sum_alpha = 0;
01466                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01467                         {
01468                                 alpha[i] = alpha2[i] - alpha2[i + l];
01469                                 sum_alpha += System.Math.Abs(alpha[i]);
01470                         }
01471                         System.Console.Out.Write("nu = " + sum_alpha / (param.C * l) + "\n");
01472                 }
01473                 
01474                 private static void  solve_nu_svr(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double[] alpha, Solver.SolutionInfo si)
01475                 {
01476                         int l = prob.l;
01477                         double C = param.C;
01478                         double[] alpha2 = new double[2 * l];
01479                         double[] linear_term = new double[2 * l];
01480                         sbyte[] y = new sbyte[2 * l];
01481                         int i;
01482                         
01483                         double sum = C * param.nu * l / 2;
01484                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01485                         {
01486                                 alpha2[i] = alpha2[i + l] = System.Math.Min(sum, C);
01487                                 sum -= alpha2[i];
01488                                 
01489                                 linear_term[i] = - prob.y[i];
01490                                 y[i] = 1;
01491                                 
01492                                 linear_term[i + l] = prob.y[i];
01493                                 y[i + l] = - 1;
01494                         }
01495                         
01496                         Solver_NU s = new Solver_NU();
01497                         s.Solve(2 * l, new SVR_Q(prob, param), linear_term, y, alpha2, C, C, param.eps, si, param.shrinking);
01498                         
01499                         System.Console.Out.Write("epsilon = " + (- si.r) + "\n");
01500                         
01501                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01502                                 alpha[i] = alpha2[i] - alpha2[i + l];
01503                 }
01504                 
01505                 //
01506                 // decision_function
01507                 //
01508                 internal class decision_function
01509                 {
01510                         internal double[] alpha;
01511                         internal double rho;
01512                 }
01513                 
01514                 
01515                 internal static decision_function svm_train_one(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double Cp, double Cn)
01516                 {
01517                         double[] alpha = new double[prob.l];
01518                         Solver.SolutionInfo si = new Solver.SolutionInfo();
01519                         switch (param.svm_type)
01520                         {
01521                                 
01522                                 case svm_parameter.C_SVC: 
01523                                         solve_c_svc(prob, param, alpha, si, Cp, Cn);
01524                                         break;
01525                                 
01526                                 case svm_parameter.NU_SVC: 
01527                                         solve_nu_svc(prob, param, alpha, si);
01528                                         break;
01529                                 
01530                                 case svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS: 
01531                                         solve_one_class(prob, param, alpha, si);
01532                                         break;
01533                                 
01534                                 case svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR: 
01535                                         solve_epsilon_svr(prob, param, alpha, si);
01536                                         break;
01537                                 
01538                                 case svm_parameter.NU_SVR: 
01539                                         solve_nu_svr(prob, param, alpha, si);
01540                                         break;
01541                                 }
01542                         
01543                         System.Console.Out.Write("obj = " + si.obj + ", rho = " + si.rho + "\n");
01544                         
01545                         // output SVs
01546                         
01547                         int nSV = 0;
01548                         int nBSV = 0;
01549                         for (int i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01550                         {
01551                                 if (System.Math.Abs(alpha[i]) > 0)
01552                                 {
01553                                         ++nSV;
01554                                         if (prob.y[i] > 0)
01555                                         {
01556                                                 if (System.Math.Abs(alpha[i]) >= si.upper_bound_p)
01557                                                         ++nBSV;
01558                                         }
01559                                         else
01560                                         {
01561                                                 if (System.Math.Abs(alpha[i]) >= si.upper_bound_n)
01562                                                         ++nBSV;
01563                                         }
01564                                 }
01565                         }
01566                         
01567                         System.Console.Out.Write("nSV = " + nSV + ", nBSV = " + nBSV + "\n");
01568                         
01569                         decision_function f = new decision_function();
01570                         f.alpha = alpha;
01571                         f.rho = si.rho;
01572                         return f;
01573                 }
01574                 
01575                 // Platt's binary SVM Probablistic Output: an improvement from Lin et al.
01576                 private static void  sigmoid_train(int l, double[] dec_values, double[] labels, double[] probAB)
01577                 {
01578                         double A, B;
01579                         double prior1 = 0, prior0 = 0;
01580                         int i;
01581                         
01582                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01583                                 if (labels[i] > 0)
01584                                         prior1 += 1;
01585                                 else
01586                                         prior0 += 1;
01587                         
01588                         int max_iter = 100; // Maximal number of iterations
01589                         double min_step = 1e-10; // Minimal step taken in line search
01590                         double sigma = 1e-3; // For numerically strict PD of Hessian
01591                         double eps = 1e-5;
01592                         double hiTarget = (prior1 + 1.0) / (prior1 + 2.0);
01593                         double loTarget = 1 / (prior0 + 2.0);
01594                         double[] t = new double[l];
01595                         double fApB, p, q, h11, h22, h21, g1, g2, det, dA, dB, gd, stepsize;
01596                         double newA, newB, newf, d1, d2;
01597                         int iter;
01598                         
01599                         // Initial Point and Initial Fun Value
01600                         A = 0.0; B = System.Math.Log((prior0 + 1.0) / (prior1 + 1.0));
01601                         double fval = 0.0;
01602                         
01603                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01604                         {
01605                                 if (labels[i] > 0)
01606                                         t[i] = hiTarget;
01607                                 else
01608                                         t[i] = loTarget;
01609                                 fApB = dec_values[i] * A + B;
01610                                 if (fApB >= 0)
01611                                         fval += t[i] * fApB + System.Math.Log(1 + System.Math.Exp(- fApB));
01612                                 else
01613                                         fval += (t[i] - 1) * fApB + System.Math.Log(1 + System.Math.Exp(fApB));
01614                         }
01615                         for (iter = 0; iter < max_iter; iter++)
01616                         {
01617                                 // Update Gradient and Hessian (use H' = H + sigma I)
01618                                 h11 = sigma; // numerically ensures strict PD
01619                                 h22 = sigma;
01620                                 h21 = 0.0; g1 = 0.0; g2 = 0.0;
01621                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01622                                 {
01623                                         fApB = dec_values[i] * A + B;
01624                                         if (fApB >= 0)
01625                                         {
01626                                                 p = System.Math.Exp(- fApB) / (1.0 + System.Math.Exp(- fApB));
01627                                                 q = 1.0 / (1.0 + System.Math.Exp(- fApB));
01628                                         }
01629                                         else
01630                                         {
01631                                                 p = 1.0 / (1.0 + System.Math.Exp(fApB));
01632                                                 q = System.Math.Exp(fApB) / (1.0 + System.Math.Exp(fApB));
01633                                         }
01634                                         d2 = p * q;
01635                                         h11 += dec_values[i] * dec_values[i] * d2;
01636                                         h22 += d2;
01637                                         h21 += dec_values[i] * d2;
01638                                         d1 = t[i] - p;
01639                                         g1 += dec_values[i] * d1;
01640                                         g2 += d1;
01641                                 }
01642                                 
01643                                 // Stopping Criteria
01644                                 if (System.Math.Abs(g1) < eps && System.Math.Abs(g2) < eps)
01645                                         break;
01646                                 
01647                                 // Finding Newton direction: -inv(H') * g
01648                                 det = h11 * h22 - h21 * h21;
01649                                 dA = (- (h22 * g1 - h21 * g2)) / det;
01650                                 dB = (- ((- h21) * g1 + h11 * g2)) / det;
01651                                 gd = g1 * dA + g2 * dB;
01652                                 
01653                                 
01654                                 stepsize = 1; // Line Search
01655                                 while (stepsize >= min_step)
01656                                 {
01657                                         newA = A + stepsize * dA;
01658                                         newB = B + stepsize * dB;
01659                                         
01660                                         // New function value
01661                                         newf = 0.0;
01662                                         for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01663                                         {
01664                                                 fApB = dec_values[i] * newA + newB;
01665                                                 if (fApB >= 0)
01666                                                         newf += t[i] * fApB + System.Math.Log(1 + System.Math.Exp(- fApB));
01667                                                 else
01668                                                         newf += (t[i] - 1) * fApB + System.Math.Log(1 + System.Math.Exp(fApB));
01669                                         }
01670                                         // Check sufficient decrease
01671                                         if (newf < fval + 0.0001 * stepsize * gd)
01672                                         {
01673                                                 A = newA; B = newB; fval = newf;
01674                                                 break;
01675                                         }
01676                                         else
01677                                                 stepsize = stepsize / 2.0;
01678                                 }
01679                                 
01680                                 if (stepsize < min_step)
01681                                 {
01682                                         System.Console.Error.Write("Line search fails in two-class probability estimates\n");
01683                                         break;
01684                                 }
01685                         }
01686                         
01687                         if (iter >= max_iter)
01688                                 System.Console.Error.Write("Reaching maximal iterations in two-class probability estimates\n");
01689                         probAB[0] = A; probAB[1] = B;
01690                 }
01691                 
01692                 private static double sigmoid_predict(double decision_value, double A, double B)
01693                 {
01694                         double fApB = decision_value * A + B;
01695                         if (fApB >= 0)
01696                                 return System.Math.Exp(- fApB) / (1.0 + System.Math.Exp(- fApB));
01697                         else
01698                                 return 1.0 / (1 + System.Math.Exp(fApB));
01699                 }
01700                 
01701                 // Method 2 from the multiclass_prob paper by Wu, Lin, and Weng
01702                 private static void  multiclass_probability(int k, double[][] r, double[] p)
01703                 {
01704                         int t;
01705                         int iter = 0, max_iter = 100;
01706                         double[][] Q = new double[k][];
01707                         for (int i = 0; i < k; i++)
01708                         {
01709                                 Q[i] = new double[k];
01710                         }
01711                         double[] Qp = new double[k];
01712                         double pQp, eps = 0.001;
01713                         
01714                         for (t = 0; t < k; t++)
01715                         {
01716                                 p[t] = 1.0 / k; // Valid if k = 1
01717                                 Q[t][t] = 0;
01718                                 for (int j = 0; j < t; j++)
01719                                 {
01720                                         Q[t][t] += r[j][t] * r[j][t];
01721                                         Q[t][j] = Q[j][t];
01722                                 }
01723                                 for (int j = t + 1; j < k; j++)
01724                                 {
01725                                         Q[t][t] += r[j][t] * r[j][t];
01726                                         Q[t][j] = (- r[j][t]) * r[t][j];
01727                                 }
01728                         }
01729                         for (iter = 0; iter < max_iter; iter++)
01730                         {
01731                                 // stopping condition, recalculate QP,pQP for numerical accuracy
01732                                 pQp = 0;
01733                                 for (t = 0; t < k; t++)
01734                                 {
01735                                         Qp[t] = 0;
01736                                         for (int j = 0; j < k; j++)
01737                                                 Qp[t] += Q[t][j] * p[j];
01738                                         pQp += p[t] * Qp[t];
01739                                 }
01740                                 double max_error = 0;
01741                                 for (t = 0; t < k; t++)
01742                                 {
01743                                         double error = System.Math.Abs(Qp[t] - pQp);
01744                                         if (error > max_error)
01745                                                 max_error = error;
01746                                 }
01747                                 if (max_error < eps)
01748                                         break;
01749                                 
01750                                 for (t = 0; t < k; t++)
01751                                 {
01752                                         double diff = (- Qp[t] + pQp) / Q[t][t];
01753                                         p[t] += diff;
01754                                         pQp = (pQp + diff * (diff * Q[t][t] + 2 * Qp[t])) / (1 + diff) / (1 + diff);
01755                                         for (int j = 0; j < k; j++)
01756                                         {
01757                                                 Qp[j] = (Qp[j] + diff * Q[t][j]) / (1 + diff);
01758                                                 p[j] /= (1 + diff);
01759                                         }
01760                                 }
01761                         }
01762                         if (iter >= max_iter)
01763                                 System.Console.Error.Write("Exceeds max_iter in multiclass_prob\n");
01764                 }
01765                 
01766                 // Cross-validation decision values for probability estimates
01767                 private static void  svm_binary_svc_probability(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, double Cp, double Cn, double[] probAB)
01768                 {
01769                         int i;
01770                         int nr_fold = 5;
01771                         int[] perm = new int[prob.l];
01772                         double[] dec_values = new double[prob.l];
01773                         
01774                         // random shuffle
01775                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01776                                 perm[i] = i;
01777                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01778                         {
01779                                 //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01780                                 int j = i + (int) (SupportClass.Random.NextDouble() * (prob.l - i));
01781                                 do 
01782                                 {
01783                                         int _ = perm[i]; perm[i] = perm[j]; perm[j] = _;
01784                                 }
01785                                 while (false);
01786                         }
01787                         for (i = 0; i < nr_fold; i++)
01788                         {
01789                                 int begin = i * prob.l / nr_fold;
01790                                 int end = (i + 1) * prob.l / nr_fold;
01791                                 int j, k;
01792                                 svm_problem subprob = new svm_problem();
01793                                 
01794                                 subprob.l = prob.l - (end - begin);
01795                                 subprob.x = new svm_node[subprob.l][];
01796                                 subprob.y = new double[subprob.l];
01797                                 
01798                                 k = 0;
01799                                 for (j = 0; j < begin; j++)
01800                                 {
01801                                         subprob.x[k] = prob.x[perm[j]];
01802                                         subprob.y[k] = prob.y[perm[j]];
01803                                         ++k;
01804                                 }
01805                                 for (j = end; j < prob.l; j++)
01806                                 {
01807                                         subprob.x[k] = prob.x[perm[j]];
01808                                         subprob.y[k] = prob.y[perm[j]];
01809                                         ++k;
01810                                 }
01811                                 int p_count = 0, n_count = 0;
01812                                 for (j = 0; j < k; j++)
01813                                         if (subprob.y[j] > 0)
01814                                                 p_count++;
01815                                         else
01816                                                 n_count++;
01817                                 
01818                                 if (p_count == 0 && n_count == 0)
01819                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
01820                                                 dec_values[perm[j]] = 0;
01821                                 else if (p_count > 0 && n_count == 0)
01822                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
01823                                                 dec_values[perm[j]] = 1;
01824                                 else if (p_count == 0 && n_count > 0)
01825                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
01826                                                 dec_values[perm[j]] = - 1;
01827                                 else
01828                                 {
01829                                         svm_parameter subparam = (svm_parameter) param.Clone();
01830                                         subparam.probability = 0;
01831                                         subparam.C = 1.0;
01832                                         subparam.nr_weight = 2;
01833                                         subparam.weight_label = new int[2];
01834                                         subparam.weight = new double[2];
01835                                         subparam.weight_label[0] = + 1;
01836                                         subparam.weight_label[1] = - 1;
01837                                         subparam.weight[0] = Cp;
01838                                         subparam.weight[1] = Cn;
01839                                         svm_model submodel = svm_train(subprob, subparam);
01840                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
01841                                         {
01842                                                 double[] dec_value = new double[1];
01843                                                 svm_predict_values(submodel, prob.x[perm[j]], dec_value);
01844                                                 dec_values[perm[j]] = dec_value[0];
01845                                                 // ensure +1 -1 order; reason not using CV subroutine
01846                                                 dec_values[perm[j]] *= submodel.label[0];
01847                                         }
01848                                 }
01849                         }
01850                         sigmoid_train(prob.l, dec_values, prob.y, probAB);
01851                 }
01852                 
01853                 // Return parameter of a Laplace distribution 
01854                 private static double svm_svr_probability(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param)
01855                 {
01856                         int i;
01857                         int nr_fold = 5;
01858                         double[] ymv = new double[prob.l];
01859                         double mae = 0;
01860                         
01861                         svm_parameter newparam = (svm_parameter) param.Clone();
01862                         newparam.probability = 0;
01863                         svm_cross_validation(prob, newparam, nr_fold, ymv);
01864                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01865                         {
01866                                 ymv[i] = prob.y[i] - ymv[i];
01867                                 mae += System.Math.Abs(ymv[i]);
01868                         }
01869                         mae /= prob.l;
01870                         double std = System.Math.Sqrt(2 * mae * mae);
01871                         int count = 0;
01872                         mae = 0;
01873                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01874                                 if (System.Math.Abs(ymv[i]) > 5 * std)
01875                                         count = count + 1;
01876                                 else
01877                                         mae += System.Math.Abs(ymv[i]);
01878                         mae /= (prob.l - count);
01879                         System.Console.Error.Write("Prob. model for test data: target value = predicted value + z,\nz: Laplace distribution e^(-|z|/sigma)/(2sigma),sigma=" + mae + "\n");
01880                         return mae;
01881                 }
01882                 
01883                 //
01884                 // Interface functions
01885                 //
01886                 public static svm_model svm_train(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param)
01887                 {
01888                         svm_model model = new svm_model();
01889                         model.param = param;
01890                         
01891                         if (param.svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS || param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
01892                         {
01893                                 // regression or one-class-svm
01894                                 model.nr_class = 2;
01895                                 model.label = null;
01896                                 model.nSV = null;
01897                                 model.probA = null; model.probB = null;
01898                                 model.sv_coef = new double[1][];
01899                                 
01900                                 if (param.probability == 1 && (param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR))
01901                                 {
01902                                         model.probA = new double[1];
01903                                         model.probA[0] = svm_svr_probability(prob, param);
01904                                 }
01905                                 
01906                                 decision_function f = svm_train_one(prob, param, 0, 0);
01907                                 model.rho = new double[1];
01908                                 model.rho[0] = f.rho;
01909                                 
01910                                 int nSV = 0;
01911                                 int i;
01912                                 for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01913                                         if (System.Math.Abs(f.alpha[i]) > 0)
01914                                                 ++nSV;
01915                                 model.l = nSV;
01916                                 model.SV = new svm_node[nSV][];
01917                                 model.sv_coef[0] = new double[nSV];
01918                                 int j = 0;
01919                                 for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
01920                                         if (System.Math.Abs(f.alpha[i]) > 0)
01921                                         {
01922                                                 model.SV[j] = prob.x[i];
01923                                                 model.sv_coef[0][j] = f.alpha[i];
01924                                                 ++j;
01925                                         }
01926                         }
01927                         else
01928                         {
01929                                 // classification
01930                                 // find out the number of classes
01931                                 int l = prob.l;
01932                                 int max_nr_class = 16;
01933                                 int nr_class = 0;
01934                                 int[] label = new int[max_nr_class];
01935                                 int[] count = new int[max_nr_class];
01936                                 int[] index = new int[l];
01937                                 
01938                                 int i;
01939                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01940                                 {
01941                                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
01942                                         int this_label = (int) prob.y[i];
01943                                         int j;
01944                                         for (j = 0; j < nr_class; j++)
01945                                                 if (this_label == label[j])
01946                                                 {
01947                                                         ++count[j];
01948                                                         break;
01949                                                 }
01950                                         index[i] = j;
01951                                         if (j == nr_class)
01952                                         {
01953                                                 if (nr_class == max_nr_class)
01954                                                 {
01955                                                         max_nr_class *= 2;
01956                                                         int[] new_data = new int[max_nr_class];
01957                                                         Array.Copy(label, 0, new_data, 0, label.Length);
01958                                                         label = new_data;
01959                                                         
01960                                                         new_data = new int[max_nr_class];
01961                                                         Array.Copy(count, 0, new_data, 0, count.Length);
01962                                                         count = new_data;
01963                                                 }
01964                                                 label[nr_class] = this_label;
01965                                                 count[nr_class] = 1;
01966                                                 ++nr_class;
01967                                         }
01968                                 }
01969                                 
01970                                 // group training data of the same class
01971                                 
01972                                 int[] start = new int[nr_class];
01973                                 start[0] = 0;
01974                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
01975                                         start[i] = start[i - 1] + count[i - 1];
01976                                 
01977                                 svm_node[][] x = new svm_node[l][];
01978                                 
01979                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
01980                                 {
01981                                         x[start[index[i]]] = prob.x[i];
01982                                         ++start[index[i]];
01983                                 }
01984                                 
01985                                 start[0] = 0;
01986                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
01987                                         start[i] = start[i - 1] + count[i - 1];
01988                                 
01989                                 // calculate weighted C
01990                                 
01991                                 double[] weighted_C = new double[nr_class];
01992                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
01993                                         weighted_C[i] = param.C;
01994                                 for (i = 0; i < param.nr_weight; i++)
01995                                 {
01996                                         int j;
01997                                         for (j = 0; j < nr_class; j++)
01998                                                 if (param.weight_label[i] == label[j])
01999                                                         break;
02000                                         if (j == nr_class)
02001                                                 System.Console.Error.Write("warning: class label " + param.weight_label[i] + " specified in weight is not found\n");
02002                                         else
02003                                                 weighted_C[j] *= param.weight[i];
02004                                 }
02005                                 
02006                                 // train k*(k-1)/2 models
02007                                 
02008                                 bool[] nonzero = new bool[l];
02009                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
02010                                         nonzero[i] = false;
02011                                 decision_function[] f = new decision_function[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02012                                 
02013                                 double[] probA = null, probB = null;
02014                                 if (param.probability == 1)
02015                                 {
02016                                         probA = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02017                                         probB = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02018                                 }
02019                                 
02020                                 int p = 0;
02021                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02022                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02023                                         {
02024                                                 svm_problem sub_prob = new svm_problem();
02025                                                 int si = start[i], sj = start[j];
02026                                                 int ci = count[i], cj = count[j];
02027                                                 sub_prob.l = ci + cj;
02028                                                 sub_prob.x = new svm_node[sub_prob.l][];
02029                                                 sub_prob.y = new double[sub_prob.l];
02030                                                 int k;
02031                                                 for (k = 0; k < ci; k++)
02032                                                 {
02033                                                         sub_prob.x[k] = x[si + k];
02034                                                         sub_prob.y[k] = + 1;
02035                                                 }
02036                                                 for (k = 0; k < cj; k++)
02037                                                 {
02038                                                         sub_prob.x[ci + k] = x[sj + k];
02039                                                         sub_prob.y[ci + k] = - 1;
02040                                                 }
02041                                                 
02042                                                 if (param.probability == 1)
02043                                                 {
02044                                                         double[] probAB = new double[2];
02045                                                         svm_binary_svc_probability(sub_prob, param, weighted_C[i], weighted_C[j], probAB);
02046                                                         probA[p] = probAB[0];
02047                                                         probB[p] = probAB[1];
02048                                                 }
02049                                                 
02050                                                 f[p] = svm_train_one(sub_prob, param, weighted_C[i], weighted_C[j]);
02051                                                 for (k = 0; k < ci; k++)
02052                                                         if (!nonzero[si + k] && System.Math.Abs(f[p].alpha[k]) > 0)
02053                                                                 nonzero[si + k] = true;
02054                                                 for (k = 0; k < cj; k++)
02055                                                         if (!nonzero[sj + k] && System.Math.Abs(f[p].alpha[ci + k]) > 0)
02056                                                                 nonzero[sj + k] = true;
02057                                                 ++p;
02058                                         }
02059                                 
02060                                 // build output
02061                                 
02062                                 model.nr_class = nr_class;
02063                                 
02064                                 model.label = new int[nr_class];
02065                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02066                                         model.label[i] = label[i];
02067                                 
02068                                 model.rho = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02069                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2; i++)
02070                                         model.rho[i] = f[i].rho;
02071                                 
02072                                 if (param.probability == 1)
02073                                 {
02074                                         model.probA = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02075                                         model.probB = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02076                                         for (i = 0; i < nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2; i++)
02077                                         {
02078                                                 model.probA[i] = probA[i];
02079                                                 model.probB[i] = probB[i];
02080                                         }
02081                                 }
02082                                 else
02083                                 {
02084                                         model.probA = null;
02085                                         model.probB = null;
02086                                 }
02087                                 
02088                                 int nnz = 0;
02089                                 int[] nz_count = new int[nr_class];
02090                                 model.nSV = new int[nr_class];
02091                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02092                                 {
02093                                         int nSV = 0;
02094                                         for (int j = 0; j < count[i]; j++)
02095                                                 if (nonzero[start[i] + j])
02096                                                 {
02097                                                         ++nSV;
02098                                                         ++nnz;
02099                                                 }
02100                                         model.nSV[i] = nSV;
02101                                         nz_count[i] = nSV;
02102                                 }
02103                                 
02104                                 System.Console.Out.Write("Total nSV = " + nnz + "\n");
02105                                 
02106                                 model.l = nnz;
02107                                 model.SV = new svm_node[nnz][];
02108                                 p = 0;
02109                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
02110                                         if (nonzero[i])
02111                                                 model.SV[p++] = x[i];
02112                                 
02113                                 int[] nz_start = new int[nr_class];
02114                                 nz_start[0] = 0;
02115                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
02116                                         nz_start[i] = nz_start[i - 1] + nz_count[i - 1];
02117                                 
02118                                 model.sv_coef = new double[nr_class - 1][];
02119                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class - 1; i++)
02120                                         model.sv_coef[i] = new double[nnz];
02121                                 
02122                                 p = 0;
02123                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02124                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02125                                         {
02126                                                 // classifier (i,j): coefficients with
02127                                                 // i are in sv_coef[j-1][nz_start[i]...],
02128                                                 // j are in sv_coef[i][nz_start[j]...]
02129                                                 
02130                                                 int si = start[i];
02131                                                 int sj = start[j];
02132                                                 int ci = count[i];
02133                                                 int cj = count[j];
02134                                                 
02135                                                 int q = nz_start[i];
02136                                                 int k;
02137                                                 for (k = 0; k < ci; k++)
02138                                                         if (nonzero[si + k])
02139                                                                 model.sv_coef[j - 1][q++] = f[p].alpha[k];
02140                                                 q = nz_start[j];
02141                                                 for (k = 0; k < cj; k++)
02142                                                         if (nonzero[sj + k])
02143                                                                 model.sv_coef[i][q++] = f[p].alpha[ci + k];
02144                                                 ++p;
02145                                         }
02146                         }
02147                         return model;
02148                 }
02149                 
02150                 public static void  svm_cross_validation(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param, int nr_fold, double[] target)
02151                 {
02152                         int i;
02153                         int[] perm = new int[prob.l];
02154                         
02155                         // random shuffle
02156                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
02157                                 perm[i] = i;
02158                         for (i = 0; i < prob.l; i++)
02159                         {
02160                                 //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
02161                                 int j = i + (int) (SupportClass.Random.NextDouble() * (prob.l - i));
02162                                 do 
02163                                 {
02164                                         int _ = perm[i]; perm[i] = perm[j]; perm[j] = _;
02165                                 }
02166                                 while (false);
02167                         }
02168                         for (i = 0; i < nr_fold; i++)
02169                         {
02170                                 int begin = i * prob.l / nr_fold;
02171                                 int end = (i + 1) * prob.l / nr_fold;
02172                                 int j, k;
02173                                 svm_problem subprob = new svm_problem();
02174                                 
02175                                 subprob.l = prob.l - (end - begin);
02176                                 subprob.x = new svm_node[subprob.l][];
02177                                 subprob.y = new double[subprob.l];
02178                                 
02179                                 k = 0;
02180                                 for (j = 0; j < begin; j++)
02181                                 {
02182                                         subprob.x[k] = prob.x[perm[j]];
02183                                         subprob.y[k] = prob.y[perm[j]];
02184                                         ++k;
02185                                 }
02186                                 for (j = end; j < prob.l; j++)
02187                                 {
02188                                         subprob.x[k] = prob.x[perm[j]];
02189                                         subprob.y[k] = prob.y[perm[j]];
02190                                         ++k;
02191                                 }
02192                                 svm_model submodel = svm_train(subprob, param);
02193                                 if (param.probability == 1 && (param.svm_type == svm_parameter.C_SVC || param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC))
02194                                 {
02195                                         double[] prob_estimates = new double[svm_get_nr_class(submodel)];
02196                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
02197                                                 target[perm[j]] = svm_predict_probability(submodel, prob.x[perm[j]], prob_estimates);
02198                                 }
02199                                 else
02200                                         for (j = begin; j < end; j++)
02201                                                 target[perm[j]] = svm_predict(submodel, prob.x[perm[j]]);
02202                         }
02203                 }
02204                 
02205                 public static int svm_get_svm_type(svm_model model)
02206                 {
02207                         return model.param.svm_type;
02208                 }
02209                 
02210                 public static int svm_get_nr_class(svm_model model)
02211                 {
02212                         return model.nr_class;
02213                 }
02214                 
02215                 public static void  svm_get_labels(svm_model model, int[] label)
02216                 {
02217                         if (model.label != null)
02218                                 for (int i = 0; i < model.nr_class; i++)
02219                                         label[i] = model.label[i];
02220                 }
02221                 
02222                 public static double svm_get_svr_probability(svm_model model)
02223                 {
02224                         if ((model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR) && model.probA != null)
02225                                 return model.probA[0];
02226                         else
02227                         {
02228                                 System.Console.Error.Write("Model doesn't contain information for SVR probability inference\n");
02229                                 return 0;
02230                         }
02231                 }
02232                 
02233                 public static void  svm_predict_values(svm_model model, svm_node[] x, double[] dec_values)
02234                 {
02235                         if (model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
02236                         {
02237                                 double[] sv_coef = model.sv_coef[0];
02238                                 double sum = 0;
02239                                 for (int i = 0; i < model.l; i++)
02240                                         sum += sv_coef[i] * Kernel.k_function(x, model.SV[i], model.param);
02241                                 sum -= model.rho[0];
02242                                 dec_values[0] = sum;
02243                         }
02244                         else
02245                         {
02246                                 int i;
02247                                 int nr_class = model.nr_class;
02248                                 int l = model.l;
02249                                 
02250                                 double[] kvalue = new double[l];
02251                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
02252                                         kvalue[i] = Kernel.k_function(x, model.SV[i], model.param);
02253                                 
02254                                 int[] start = new int[nr_class];
02255                                 start[0] = 0;
02256                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
02257                                         start[i] = start[i - 1] + model.nSV[i - 1];
02258                                 
02259                                 int p = 0;
02260                                 int pos = 0;
02261                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02262                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02263                                         {
02264                                                 double sum = 0;
02265                                                 int si = start[i];
02266                                                 int sj = start[j];
02267                                                 int ci = model.nSV[i];
02268                                                 int cj = model.nSV[j];
02269                                                 
02270                                                 int k;
02271                                                 double[] coef1 = model.sv_coef[j - 1];
02272                                                 double[] coef2 = model.sv_coef[i];
02273                                                 for (k = 0; k < ci; k++)
02274                                                         sum += coef1[si + k] * kvalue[si + k];
02275                                                 for (k = 0; k < cj; k++)
02276                                                         sum += coef2[sj + k] * kvalue[sj + k];
02277                                                 sum -= model.rho[p++];
02278                                                 dec_values[pos++] = sum;
02279                                         }
02280                         }
02281                 }
02282                 
02283                 public static double svm_predict(svm_model model, svm_node[] x)
02284                 {
02285                         if (model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
02286                         {
02287                                 double[] res = new double[1];
02288                                 svm_predict_values(model, x, res);
02289                                 
02290                                 if (model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS)
02291                                         return (res[0] > 0)?1:- 1;
02292                                 else
02293                                         return res[0];
02294                         }
02295                         else
02296                         {
02297                                 int i;
02298                                 int nr_class = model.nr_class;
02299                                 double[] dec_values = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02300                                 svm_predict_values(model, x, dec_values);
02301                                 
02302                                 int[] vote = new int[nr_class];
02303                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02304                                         vote[i] = 0;
02305                                 int pos = 0;
02306                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02307                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02308                                         {
02309                                                 if (dec_values[pos++] > 0)
02310                                                         ++vote[i];
02311                                                 else
02312                                                         ++vote[j];
02313                                         }
02314                                 
02315                                 int vote_max_idx = 0;
02316                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
02317                                         if (vote[i] > vote[vote_max_idx])
02318                                                 vote_max_idx = i;
02319                                 return model.label[vote_max_idx];
02320                         }
02321                 }
02322                 
02323                 public static double svm_predict_probability(svm_model model, svm_node[] x, double[] prob_estimates)
02324                 {
02325                         if ((model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.C_SVC || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC) && model.probA != null && model.probB != null)
02326                         {
02327                                 int i;
02328                                 int nr_class = model.nr_class;
02329                                 double[] dec_values = new double[nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2];
02330                                 svm_predict_values(model, x, dec_values);
02331                                 
02332                                 double min_prob = 1e-7;
02333                                 double[][] tmpArray = new double[nr_class][];
02334                                 for (int i2 = 0; i2 < nr_class; i2++)
02335                                 {
02336                                         tmpArray[i2] = new double[nr_class];
02337                                 }
02338                                 double[][] pairwise_prob = tmpArray;
02339                                 
02340                                 int k = 0;
02341                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02342                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02343                                         {
02344                                                 pairwise_prob[i][j] = System.Math.Min(System.Math.Max(sigmoid_predict(dec_values[k], model.probA[k], model.probB[k]), min_prob), 1 - min_prob);
02345                                                 pairwise_prob[j][i] = 1 - pairwise_prob[i][j];
02346                                                 k++;
02347                                         }
02348                                 multiclass_probability(nr_class, pairwise_prob, prob_estimates);
02349                                 
02350                                 int prob_max_idx = 0;
02351                                 for (i = 1; i < nr_class; i++)
02352                                         if (prob_estimates[i] > prob_estimates[prob_max_idx])
02353                                                 prob_max_idx = i;
02354                                 return model.label[prob_max_idx];
02355                         }
02356                         else
02357                                 return svm_predict(model, x);
02358                 }
02359                 
02360                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'svm_type_table'. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
02361                 internal static readonly System.String[] svm_type_table = new System.String[]{"c_svc", "nu_svc", "one_class", "epsilon_svr", "nu_svr"};
02362                 
02363                 //UPGRADE_NOTE: Final was removed from the declaration of 'kernel_type_table'. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1003_3"'
02364                 internal static readonly System.String[] kernel_type_table = new System.String[]{"linear", "polynomial", "rbf", "sigmoid"};
02365                 
02366                 public static void  svm_save_model(System.String model_file_name, svm_model model)
02367                 {
02368                         //UPGRADE_TODO: Class 'java.io.DataOutputStream' was converted to 'System.IO.BinaryWriter' which has a different behavior. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1073_javaioDataOutputStream_3"'
02369                         //UPGRADE_TODO: Constructor 'java.io.FileOutputStream.FileOutputStream' was converted to 'System.IO.FileStream.FileStream' which has a different behavior. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1073_javaioFileOutputStreamFileOutputStream_javalangString_3"'
02370                         /* Original System.IO.BinaryWriter fp = new System.IO.BinaryWriter(new System.IO.FileStream(model_file_name, System.IO.FileMode.Create));*/
02371                         System.IO.StreamWriter fp = new System.IO.StreamWriter(new System.IO.FileStream(model_file_name, System.IO.FileMode.Create), System.Text.Encoding.Default);
02372                         
02373                         svm_parameter param = model.param;
02374                         
02375                         fp.Write("svm_type " + svm_type_table[param.svm_type] + "\n");
02376                         fp.Write("kernel_type " + kernel_type_table[param.kernel_type] + "\n");
02377                         
02378                         if (param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.POLY)
02379                                 fp.Write("degree " + param.degree + "\n");
02380                         
02381                         if (param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.POLY || param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.RBF || param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.SIGMOID)
02382                                 fp.Write("gamma " + param.gamma + "\n");
02383                         
02384                         if (param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.POLY || param.kernel_type == svm_parameter.SIGMOID)
02385                                 fp.Write("coef0 " + param.coef0 + "\n");
02386                         
02387                         int nr_class = model.nr_class;
02388                         int l = model.l;
02389                         fp.Write("nr_class " + nr_class + "\n");
02390                         fp.Write("total_sv " + l + "\n");
02391                         
02392                         {
02393                                 fp.Write("rho");
02394                                 for (int i = 0; i < nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2; i++)
02395                                         fp.Write(" " + model.rho[i]);
02396                                 fp.Write("\n");
02397                         }
02398                         
02399                         if (model.label != null)
02400                         {
02401                                 fp.Write("label");
02402                                 for (int i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02403                                         fp.Write(" " + model.label[i]);
02404                                 fp.Write("\n");
02405                         }
02406                         
02407                         if (model.probA != null)
02408                         // regression has probA only
02409                         {
02410                                 fp.Write("probA");
02411                                 for (int i = 0; i < nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2; i++)
02412                                         fp.Write(" " + model.probA[i]);
02413                                 fp.Write("\n");
02414                         }
02415                         if (model.probB != null)
02416                         {
02417                                 fp.Write("probB");
02418                                 for (int i = 0; i < nr_class * (nr_class - 1) / 2; i++)
02419                                         fp.Write(" " + model.probB[i]);
02420                                 fp.Write("\n");
02421                         }
02422                         
02423                         if (model.nSV != null)
02424                         {
02425                                 fp.Write("nr_sv");
02426                                 for (int i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02427                                         fp.Write(" " + model.nSV[i]);
02428                                 fp.Write("\n");
02429                         }
02430                         
02431                         fp.Write("SV\n");
02432                         double[][] sv_coef = model.sv_coef;
02433                         svm_node[][] SV = model.SV;
02434                         
02435                         for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
02436                         {
02437                                 for (int j = 0; j < nr_class - 1; j++)
02438                                         fp.Write(sv_coef[j][i] + " ");
02439                                 
02440                                 svm_node[] p = SV[i];
02441                                 for (int j = 0; j < p.Length; j++)
02442                                         fp.Write(p[j].index + ":" + p[j].value_Renamed + " ");
02443                                 fp.Write("\n");
02444                         }
02445                         
02446                         fp.Close();
02447                 }

02449                 private static double atof(System.String s)
02450                 {
02451                         return System.Double.Parse(s);
02452                 }
02453                 
02454                 private static int atoi(System.String s)
02455                 {
02456                         return System.Int32.Parse(s);
02457                 }
