02459                 public static svm_model svm_load_model(System.String model_file_name)
02460                 {
02461                         //UPGRADE_TODO: The differences in the expected value  of parameters for constructor 'java.io.BufferedReader.BufferedReader'  may cause compilation errors.  'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1092_3"'
02462                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: At least one expression was used more than once in the target code. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1181_3"'
02463                         //UPGRADE_TODO: Constructor 'java.io.FileReader.FileReader' was converted to 'System.IO.StreamReader' which has a different behavior. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1073_3"'
02464                         /*Original System.IO.StreamReader fp = new System.IO.StreamReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(model_file_name, System.Text.Encoding.Default).BaseStream, new System.IO.StreamReader(model_file_name, System.Text.Encoding.Default).CurrentEncoding);*/
02465                         System.IO.StreamReader fp = new System.IO.StreamReader(new System.IO.FileStream(model_file_name, System.IO.FileMode.Open), System.Text.Encoding.Default);
02466                         
02467                         // read parameters
02468                         
02469                         svm_model model = new svm_model();
02470                         svm_parameter param = new svm_parameter();
02471                         model.param = param;
02472                         model.rho = null;
02473                         model.probA = null;
02474                         model.probB = null;
02475                         model.label = null;
02476                         model.nSV = null;
02477                         
02478                         while (true)
02479                         {
02480                                 System.String cmd = fp.ReadLine();
02481                                 System.String arg = cmd.Substring(cmd.IndexOf((System.Char) ' ') + 1);
02482                                 
02483                                 if (cmd.StartsWith("svm_type"))
02484                                 {
02485                                         int i;
02486                                         for (i = 0; i < svm_type_table.Length; i++)
02487                                         {
02488                                                 if (arg.IndexOf(svm_type_table[i]) != - 1)
02489                                                 {
02490                                                         param.svm_type = i;
02491                                                         break;
02492                                                 }
02493                                         }
02494                                         if (i == svm_type_table.Length)
02495                                         {
02496                                                 System.Console.Error.Write("unknown svm type.\n");
02497                                                 return null;
02498                                         }
02499                                 }
02500                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("kernel_type"))
02501                                 {
02502                                         int i;
02503                                         for (i = 0; i < kernel_type_table.Length; i++)
02504                                         {
02505                                                 if (arg.IndexOf(kernel_type_table[i]) != - 1)
02506                                                 {
02507                                                         param.kernel_type = i;
02508                                                         break;
02509                                                 }
02510                                         }
02511                                         if (i == kernel_type_table.Length)
02512                                         {
02513                                                 System.Console.Error.Write("unknown kernel function.\n");
02514                                                 return null;
02515                                         }
02516                                 }
02517                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("degree"))
02518                                         param.degree = atof(arg);
02519                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("gamma"))
02520                                         param.gamma = atof(arg);
02521                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("coef0"))
02522                                         param.coef0 = atof(arg);
02523                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("nr_class"))
02524                                         model.nr_class = atoi(arg);
02525                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("total_sv"))
02526                                         model.l = atoi(arg);
02527                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("rho"))
02528                                 {
02529                                         int n = model.nr_class * (model.nr_class - 1) / 2;
02530                                         model.rho = new double[n];
02531                                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(arg);
02532                                         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
02533                                                 model.rho[i] = atof(st.NextToken());
02534                                 }
02535                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("label"))
02536                                 {
02537                                         int n = model.nr_class;
02538                                         model.label = new int[n];
02539                                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(arg);
02540                                         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
02541                                                 model.label[i] = atoi(st.NextToken());
02542                                 }
02543                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("probA"))
02544                                 {
02545                                         int n = model.nr_class * (model.nr_class - 1) / 2;
02546                                         model.probA = new double[n];
02547                                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(arg);
02548                                         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
02549                                                 model.probA[i] = atof(st.NextToken());
02550                                 }
02551                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("probB"))
02552                                 {
02553                                         int n = model.nr_class * (model.nr_class - 1) / 2;
02554                                         model.probB = new double[n];
02555                                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(arg);
02556                                         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
02557                                                 model.probB[i] = atof(st.NextToken());
02558                                 }
02559                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("nr_sv"))
02560                                 {
02561                                         int n = model.nr_class;
02562                                         model.nSV = new int[n];
02563                                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(arg);
02564                                         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
02565                                                 model.nSV[i] = atoi(st.NextToken());
02566                                 }
02567                                 else if (cmd.StartsWith("SV"))
02568                                 {
02569                                         break;
02570                                 }
02571                                 else
02572                                 {
02573                                         System.Console.Error.Write("unknown text in model file\n");
02574                                         return null;
02575                                 }
02576                         }
02577                         
02578                         // read sv_coef and SV
02579                         
02580                         int m = model.nr_class - 1;
02581                         int l = model.l;
02582                         model.sv_coef = new double[m][];
02583                         for (int i = 0; i < m; i++)
02584                         {
02585                                 model.sv_coef[i] = new double[l];
02586                         }
02587                         model.SV = new svm_node[l][];
02588                         
02589                         for (int i = 0; i < l; i++)
02590                         {
02591                                 System.String line = fp.ReadLine();
02592                                 SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(line, " \t\n\r\f:");
02593                                 
02594                                 for (int k = 0; k < m; k++)
02595                                         model.sv_coef[k][i] = atof(st.NextToken());
02596                                 int n = st.Count / 2;
02597                                 model.SV[i] = new svm_node[n];
02598                                 for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
02599                                 {
02600                                         model.SV[i][j] = new svm_node();
02601                                         model.SV[i][j].index = atoi(st.NextToken());
02602                                         model.SV[i][j].value_Renamed = atof(st.NextToken());
02603                                 }
02604                         }
02605                         
02606                         fp.Close();
02607                         return model;
02608                 }
02609                 
02610                 public static System.String svm_check_parameter(svm_problem prob, svm_parameter param)
02611                 {
02612                         // svm_type
02613                         
02614                         int svm_type = param.svm_type;
02615                         if (svm_type != svm_parameter.C_SVC && svm_type != svm_parameter.NU_SVC && svm_type != svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS && svm_type != svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR && svm_type != svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
02616                                 return "unknown svm type";
02617                         
02618                         // kernel_type
02619                         
02620                         int kernel_type = param.kernel_type;
02621                         if (kernel_type != svm_parameter.LINEAR && kernel_type != svm_parameter.POLY && kernel_type != svm_parameter.RBF && kernel_type != svm_parameter.SIGMOID)
02622                                 return "unknown kernel type";
02623                         
02624                         // cache_size,eps,C,nu,p,shrinking
02625                         
02626                         if (param.cache_size <= 0)
02627                                 return "cache_size <= 0";
02628                         
02629                         if (param.eps <= 0)
02630                                 return "eps <= 0";
02631                         
02632                         if (svm_type == svm_parameter.C_SVC || svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
02633                                 if (param.C <= 0)
02634                                         return "C <= 0";
02635                         
02636                         if (svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC || svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS || svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
02637                                 if (param.nu < 0 || param.nu > 1)
02638                                         return "nu < 0 or nu > 1";
02639                         
02640                         if (svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR)
02641                                 if (param.p < 0)
02642                                         return "p < 0";
02643                         
02644                         if (param.shrinking != 0 && param.shrinking != 1)
02645                                 return "shrinking != 0 and shrinking != 1";
02646                         
02647                         if (param.probability != 0 && param.probability != 1)
02648                                 return "probability != 0 and probability != 1";
02649                         
02650                         if (param.probability == 1 && svm_type == svm_parameter.ONE_CLASS)
02651                                 return "one-class SVM probability output not supported yet";
02652                         
02653                         // check whether nu-svc is feasible
02654                         
02655                         if (svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC)
02656                         {
02657                                 int l = prob.l;
02658                                 int max_nr_class = 16;
02659                                 int nr_class = 0;
02660                                 int[] label = new int[max_nr_class];
02661                                 int[] count = new int[max_nr_class];
02662                                 
02663                                 int i;
02664                                 for (i = 0; i < l; i++)
02665                                 {
02666                                         //UPGRADE_WARNING: Data types in Visual C# might be different.  Verify the accuracy of narrowing conversions. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1042_3"'
02667                                         int this_label = (int) prob.y[i];
02668                                         int j;
02669                                         for (j = 0; j < nr_class; j++)
02670                                                 if (this_label == label[j])
02671                                                 {
02672                                                         ++count[j];
02673                                                         break;
02674                                                 }
02675                                         
02676                                         if (j == nr_class)
02677                                         {
02678                                                 if (nr_class == max_nr_class)
02679                                                 {
02680                                                         max_nr_class *= 2;
02681                                                         int[] new_data = new int[max_nr_class];
02682                                                         Array.Copy(label, 0, new_data, 0, label.Length);
02683                                                         label = new_data;
02684                                                         
02685                                                         new_data = new int[max_nr_class];
02686                                                         Array.Copy(count, 0, new_data, 0, count.Length);
02687                                                         count = new_data;
02688                                                 }
02689                                                 label[nr_class] = this_label;
02690                                                 count[nr_class] = 1;
02691                                                 ++nr_class;
02692                                         }
02693                                 }
02694                                 
02695                                 for (i = 0; i < nr_class; i++)
02696                                 {
02697                                         int n1 = count[i];
02698                                         for (int j = i + 1; j < nr_class; j++)
02699                                         {
02700                                                 int n2 = count[j];
02701                                                 if (param.nu * (n1 + n2) / 2 > System.Math.Min(n1, n2))
02702                                                         return "specified nu is infeasible";
02703                                         }
02704                                 }
02705                         }
02706                         
02707                         return null;
02708                 }
02709                 
02710                 public static int svm_check_probability_model(svm_model model)
02711                 {
02712                         if (((model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.C_SVC || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC) && model.probA != null && model.probB != null) || ((model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || model.param.svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR) && model.probA != null))
02713                                 return 1;
02714                         else
02715                                 return 0;
02716                 }
02717         }
02718 }
